Reviews.Title: Great "all in one"
Reviews.Author: E. Carter
Reviews.Content: I have had several Olympus cameras and had good luck with all of them. Received the SZ-31MR just before a trip to Victoria, BC in September. Beautiful weather and the city was still green with lots of flowers. This trip was really a great opportunity to  test the versatility of the camera, macro for the flowers, various wide angle and telephoto for harbor scenes, legislative house by day and night, scenery pictures from a drive in the mountains, etc. etc.  September is a beautiful time of the year to visit Victoria by the way.  I tried out the "hand-held starlight" with impressive results. Obviously the results are better if the camera is supported, but did get some great night shots of lit buildings, street markets, etc. Impressed with the versatility of the camera, optical zoom is very impressive for something this small and light, even digital zoom is good in day light. For a fit in your pocket, light weight, pretty much do it all camera, I can't think of a better one. I have also used the "pet mode" to get some great pictures of our dogs!

Reviews.Title: Novice who didn't spring for the DSLR
Reviews.Author: vandagal
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the camera very much.  I am a mother of 3 and a teacher. I contemplated getting a DSLR Nikon or Canon as that is what most of my friends use.  However, I have limited "learning time" and came aross this camera as it was a lightning deal on Amazon.  I ordered it after reading the reviews, thinking I could return it if it was a lemon.  I am so glad I took the chance.  I see that this camera has many of the same features as a DSLR just in a smaller and easier to handle package.  I am just getting acquainted with the basics but I am also learning how to adjust things manually by getting on Pinterest and looking up things like "white balance" and "ISO".  I think I'm going to get a lot of use out of this little camera.  The pics. I have taken so far of my kids and pets are above and beyond my expectations.  I had a little compact digital camera from Panaaonic before and this one blows it out of the water!  If you are looking to move forward in technology but don't want to lug around a larger DSLR (or spend massive amounts of time learning how to use it), this camera just might be for you.

Reviews.Title: Solid camera, excellent mix of features and manual overrides, great video.
Reviews.Author: NWLB
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera with strong optical zoom, that could take decent lower light photos on cruises, about the neighaborhood, and sometimes pinch-hit with video.  This is my second camera from Olympus, the last being a 1996 D-500L.  (Which still works and for a .85 mega pixel unit does very well.)  The optical zoom is quick.  The ability to get around auto-focus and tap the video screen is one feature I consider key to enjoying it.  Where some cameras struggle to focus, this one is able to lock onto whatever I touch, if it is stuck at all.  The dial for primary modes is handy and prevents the need to deal with the menu most of the time.  The secondary rotary dial helps speed through secondary menus and such.  The video quality was surprisingly good, and though I will continue to use my dedicated camcorder for most video needs, this one provides an alternative I don't feel any hesitation to use.  The ability to instantly start video recording from a secondary button is excellent.  The burst photo modes are handy and work well.  I can use this camera and have confidence that if I hit the shutter button the photo is there.  There is some lag with displaying the results, however you quickly learn to ignore the lag and just shoot pictures.  The camera is fast and powerful enough that you do not need to worry, you just shoot.  Put a 16 GB SD card into this camera and just fire away.  I found myself taking far more photos that turned out vastly better than a 10 mega pixel Kodak I replaced with this device.No, this isn't as tiny as some pocket cameras nor as connected as phones.  But if you seriously need to have why tiny cameras or phones are lousy for even slightly thoughtful photography, you don't need this camera or to read this review.  I would buy this camera with high confidence, even some of the lesser models in the line.  Though in this case, you get all features.  I can see this camera working hard for fully three or four years.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Suzan
Reviews.Content: Just got it went out took pics. all the magic senes are great. I just know I'm going to have fun with this camera. FYI: Order an extra battery at least one. It uses the battery very fast with I guess all the features. I did and an extra charger both are inexpensive on amazon. The charger that comes with the camera has to plug in through the camera. The charger I got for extra battery just goes in charger much easier esp. if u were using one while charging the other. Love the camera. Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Minzy
Reviews.Content: This is one of a kind camera.  You can take video and pictures simultaneously and with so many features and functionality that you cannot find in other camera and yet it is easy to use.  The quality of the combined pictures (16M) and videos (1080p) resolutions can be achieve clearly in single shooting.  Very handy as no need to have a separate camera and videocam to take in any occasion.  Wow, I'm amazed of this product.  I believe Olympus set a standards for all camera with multiple recording features and functionality.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera! #Amazing
Reviews.Author: Alexandra
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I just got it today #Christmas and I have fallen in love with this camera. So far the features are great and work great. The only feature I have not figured out yet is the high speed sequential shooting thing. I just never got the time to try to figure it out. But I kind of need to figure it out for cheerleading and gymnastics. Any ways I love this camera; great zoom; amazing in lower light; good features!!!! I would really recoment this to any one that does like nature pictures because this is good with taking in all of the beauitiful color. This is also for the people that do sports and take videos of themselves to make sure that they got the routine or stunt. Guilty of that ;) All around great!

Reviews.Title: Really love this camera
Reviews.Author: Zen Dinh "Zen337"
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera, it did an excellent job in taking pictures and recording video in HD. The video recording came out even better than my other sony hdr-cx210 camcorder.Colors produce much better, i got a $50 rebate when it just came out.

Reviews.Title: Just great!
Reviews.Author: Stefano De Andrade
Reviews.Content: This camera takes outstanding pictures and videos. I also have a Canon T3i but I wanted a compact camera that I could always take with me. The decision was difficult.. I was thinking of a lumix since I used to have one and it was great too but the specs of this one caught my attention. It takes sharper pictures than most other compact cameras, super-macro and 24x zoom work perfectly. It also works great at low light situations even do you cannot manually change the shutter speed. It's ridiculously light and it feels real nice on your hands. The magic filters are fun if you're into that. Compared to my T3i this camera is right up there. It's very easy to use. Burst mode feels like firing a machine gun.. I'm really satisfied with this camera.. Now I'll give my T3i a rest.. If your looking into photography this should be a great way to start.

Reviews.Title: Great Value-- A Lot of Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: Booker Looker
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. This camera has everything I was looking for--  long zoom, good for close shots, not too heavy/bulky, HD video capability and much more.  I also like that it uses lithium battery.  I've had negative experiences with rechargeable AA type batteries, even the pricey ones.  The li battery on this camera lasts and lasts.  Feels good in my hands; just the right combination of functionality and carry-ability.  This is my 3rd Olympus camera and I've been more than satisfied with all of them.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I've Purchased
Reviews.Author: Olivia
Reviews.Content: Just got a job and so I saved up as much money as I could to buy myself a nice little camera, and this is the one I chose! It's absolutely fantastic with great settings. Not only is it easy to use, but it takes some beautiful pictures. The "MAGIC" modes are great fun and add such a nice effect to photos.During the Supermoon, my mom and I compared photos. She has the OLYMPUS OM-D with all these fancy lenses, and I used this Olympus SZ-31mr (black one). My photos turned out much better than hers, and she was quite jealous she couldn't get any to look like mine! I HIGHLY recommend this camera to anyone and everyone who is just looking for a point-n-shoot camera that ALSO takes amazing photos.One more thing: the video has great quality as well, and you can even add in magic effects as well! The panorama is great. Just, everything is great. I'll always get an Olympus over any Nikon or Canon.

Reviews.Title: Superb.
Reviews.Author: R. C. Moore
Reviews.Content: Awesome optics. Easy to navigate menus. If you're an Olympus user, there's very little learning curve.  A dream come true.

Reviews.Title: Super Camera So Far
Reviews.Author: J. DAVIS "pepineagles"
Reviews.Content: A lot of research went into buying this camera and it was worth the time. We have a DSLR camera with multiple lenses, but it is never available when you need it. It is just too bulky to carry everywhere. The SZ31 is slightly bulkier that the basic point and shoot, but is an excellent size and wieght for everyday use. We compared the SZ31 with a basic Canon point and shoot with less zoom capability. Take into consideration that the Canon was $50 less and is a couple years older.Picture comparisons. All pictures taken without a tripod:View Finder: The Canon has a view finder as-well-as the LCD screen. However, the LCD screen must be turned off to preserve AA battery life. There is no on-board charger The Olympus has only the LCD screen, but has a stronger battery and on-board charging.The battery lasted through a day of shooting.Sea plane at approx 1+ miles: Canon photos blurred-barely distinguish the plane. The Olympus was clear with mid zoom.Outdoor group photos: Canon had some blurred photos. Olympus was sharper and more vivid even though the user was shaking.Flying stink bugs were very clear.Distance group photos: All Canon shots were blurred. The Olympus was much sharper with better color.Beach pebbles in/out of the water: The canon took a decent photo of the beach pebbles, but the pebbles in the water were washed out. The Olympus pictures appeared as though you were looking through Polaroid glasses. The pebbles in the water were very vivid.Panoramas: The Canon could not take panorama. Individual shots had to be stitched on a computer program. The Olympus has a meter showing the progress of the spanning. The panoramas were excellent.The photo software program that comes with this camera is excellent and relatively easy to use. It is one of the best we have found.Our relatives using the Canon were amazed and enjoyed the features of the SZ31. They are now converts.There are a few improvements that Olympus could have made. A viewfinder would be an advantage for telephoto shooting. Only one clip for a hand strap is on the camera. a second one with a neck strap would be helpful. Finally, the full out zoom seemed to blurr.We purchased a couple of accessories. The Case Logic DCB-302 camera case fits the camera like a glove for ease of carrying. It has room for memory cards and extra batteries. There is no room for extra cords or an accessory battery charger. We also purchased an accessory kit from Davismax (Amazon) that includes 2 Halcyon 1500 mAH batteries (standard battery is 1000 mAH), an AC/DC charger, LCD screen protector and a worthless tripod. Note, we bought this value package knowing we would not use the tripod. We also have two HS memory cards.We will update this as we get to know the camera better.Update: My wife took our first video along with the still shot. Both the video and the still were excellent along with sound. She was ecstatic! Still lovin' this camera.

Reviews.Title: My most awesome camera ever
Reviews.Author: Big Deer Hunter
Reviews.Content: I bought this right before a trip to the UK and Ireland. The most awesome camera ever, and I am still getting used to the settings and modes.  Beautiful pictures, full 1080p HD video, easy to use.  Granted, I am a longtime Olympus fan, but I just love it. AND the guys I bought it from (Beauty of RevaleSkin) came through to get it delivered in a very short time so I could take it on the trip.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: marilyn rogan
Reviews.Content: The camera is exactly as it was described in the information provided. It is an excellent camera and am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great little Point and Shoot.
Reviews.Author: Brian Schoenly
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the quality of the photos I have taken with this little camera. It is easy to use, easy to hold, small and light enough to fit in my pocket. I bought this one for my summer vacation.

Reviews.Title: Olympus sz-31MR.
Reviews.Author: Fidencia
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera 5 stars because the performance is over and above for such a small camera. Has lots of features from taking a photo to edit a pic.

Reviews.Title: Great outdoors, terrible for people.
Reviews.Author: Vincent Fiorenza
Reviews.Content: Takes good outdoor pictures.  Faces and people, indoors in general, pictures come out very blurry, regardless of the settings.  Occasionally a good one will happen, but that's a rarity.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: Derek Mendez
Reviews.Content: Love my camera, great quality, very easy to use, gives a lot of features to use, etc. N/A N/A N/A.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Sharon E. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: After using the camera, my daughter was completely satisfied. She really likes all the special features that this camera has.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Leong WW
Reviews.Content: The shipment was expeditious. I received the item in good order. I used the product and it met my requirement. No problem at all.

Reviews.Title: Good camera!
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel T. Linzaga
Reviews.Content: I like all the features although I may need to study well the owner's manual so I could familiarize with all features.

Reviews.Title: SO HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: Brandie
Reviews.Content: This is the best Camera from Olypus that I have purchased yet!  I absolutely love the stabilzer on it.  No matter what I get a clear shot every time.  The zoom is amazingly clear. Easy to use, small and light weight and actually easier to keep a hold of it with this design.  I HIGHLY recomend this camera to everyone and especailly those that might not have as steady a hand as they would like.

Reviews.Title: A Quality Photo Tool at a great price
Reviews.Author: RUSTIC
Reviews.Content: A lot of serious camera features and quality in a small package.We now take this camera into the field instead of the more costly ones, sort of a 'throw down' field camera with all of the features of the 3K$ ones.

Reviews.Title: Olympus SZ-31 MR Camera
Reviews.Author: DD
Reviews.Content: This small camera feels wonderful in my hand as it has more heft than the smaller pocket cameras, and the grip is very comfortable.  The multitude of features available with this camera make it a fun one to use when out and about, and I love being able to just grab and shoot as the moment strikes me.  I have yet to learn by doing, all that this camera is capable of, however just returned from a vacation where I used it in various settings and it worked well. The super zoom is a great feature, and I used it often, and had the camera "on" a lot and it was still easy on the battery.  I am not very astute with cameras, so wanted one that would be an easy out-of-the box camera with lots of potential.  The panorama feature is fun, and the numerous settings provide many options for special effects.  Videos are a simple push-button feature, and I loved that I could take photos will taking videos.  I really like that the pop-up flash is in the center of the top line of the camera and not at a corner where fingers could rest, as is the case with most other pocket cameras so you will not find yourself holding down the flash when the camera is trying to open it.  Summarizing, this is just what I wanted in a pocket camera, altho it is just a bit larger and few ounces heavier than most pocket cameras. It is my preference to carry it in a small shoulder sling case rather than in my pocket so I also bought the small Lowepro compact camera bag which is perfect for this camera as it has nice padding, little inner pockets for extra battery and memory cards, and room for me to drop in my car keys, or camera wipes, etc.  I added a strip of press-on Velcro to the back outer pocket to secure anything flat I may wish to carry (dr. license, $$, cr. card, etc).  I love photographing my pets at home so this camera is always hanging in the case where I can quickly grab.  Pet facial recognition is sort of fun, as is the 'beauty'  effect for portrait type photos.  Also the touch screen makes it easy to take a photo if you like touch screen features.

Reviews.Title: Compact , fast, clear sharp pictures
Reviews.Author: Dano
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera, and it did not require the long learning curve of a full body digital SLR.  Great telephoto shots od my house projects, and really convenient to pull out to get sudden nature shots too

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Kayak Carrier
Reviews.Content: Camera came in non-standard packaging and I assume it was refurbished or a customer return and not a new item.  The camera made a very audible digital sound when using the zoom function (louder than most cameras and not the typical whir of gears).  The camera also made a terrible grinding noise when trying to focus at extended zoom ranges.  I got a great price and paid over a hundred dollars less than the average sale price on Amazon but it still wasn't worth it...returned it in less than a week.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't quite do what it claims!
Reviews.Author: magnetman
Reviews.Content: Very Disappointed with product.  Can't shoot still photos with video in Hi-res (1080P 60). When using Hi-Res (IAuto Setting) the flash does not engage!  Too many querks with this camera. Don't believe what Olympus video shows!  Left several emails and received no responses to my questions. Gave it 2 stars because it does take nice pictures but could have been much better if the features shown in their video were obtained in an easier manner (if they really work at all)!  Still don't understand how the auto flash does not go off in an auto setting within a totally dark room!  Owner's Manual is not printed and does not provide enough info online.  Save your money!Update.....Flash would not fire in Iauto setting even though the camera set to automatic flash. Went into a totally darken room where I could not see my hand in front of my face and the flash would still not fire!  Spoke to technical support and they told me the camera was defected and it would take up to two months to get it back!!!  Amazon was nice enough to take the camera back and offer a full refund!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with product
Reviews.Author: Denise Schumacher
Reviews.Content: Camera froze in I could not operate it anymore until I shut it off and on again.  Would not recommend

Reviews.Title: OLYMPUS SZ-31MR CAMERA
Reviews.Author: F FULLER
Reviews.Content: This is my first Olympus Camera. It is a nice beginners,And user friendly with very nice features i will really enjoy it and learning to use all the function.I REALLY IT. F FULLER, NC

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera....!!! <3
Reviews.Author: Claudiasagas
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my husband(not an expert) but he loves it, I can't afford nothing else but this one has everything what he needs...  Just a little sound nothing out of this world

Reviews.Title: Going back to my canon
Reviews.Author: Anna H
Reviews.Content: I was hoping that the zoom and the video would work well.  However, when I tested it out the anytime you had to zoom you can clearly hear it.  When I tested to video it had a weird clicking sound.  Overall, the quality and make was not worth it to me.  I returned the camera and the additional battery I had bought.  It was a good thing I bought it through amazon.  I'm going back to my Canon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband and he absolutely loved it.  He did reluctantly return it because it didn't have the HDR features he was needing, but otherwise an awesome camera.

Reviews.Title: Sold a gray market camera.
Reviews.Author: Dan - Managed Property Services
Reviews.Content: I was sold a gray market camera. The charger cord was the 240 volt European style and Olympus USA was not able to match the S/N for a USA warranty. I contacted Amazon and Preetham said "While we shipped your order, the inventory was provided to us by a seller, and I'm not able to send you a replacement."I would probably like the camera more if I could charge the battery to use it!

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Adilson Carlini de Araujo
Reviews.Content: I like Olympus SZ-31MR 16MP CMOS Camera with 24x Wide-Angle Zoom and 3-inch... arrived in time correct and I am very happy!

Reviews.Title: Don't recommend this camera
Reviews.Author: Patty Terry
Reviews.Content: The SZ-31MR is noticably heavy.  In addition, when this camera arrived, it was missing the USB cable for downloading pictures.  I'm still trying to resolve the issue.

Reviews.Title: wrong color
Reviews.Author: Sundee Jacobson
Reviews.Content: i guess i should have read the reviews regarding gregory electronics (the vendor) before ordering - i have no idea if the camera is any good or not, my mom really likes her black one, so i ordered the silver one - i know color doesn't make a lot of difference, but when you pay good money for something you want it to be what you ordered - i have read a lot about this camera and i really like what it can do...it appears to do just about everything you need without having to go the slr route - i especially liked the ability to take video and stills at the same time - the touchscreen panel and the zoom.

Reviews.Title: Great specs..hard to hold
Reviews.Author: sance
Reviews.Content: Love the specs and features, but the big negative is the size.  I have medium size hands and the camera is a hard to hold.I would not buy this camera if I had been able to hold it.  I would opt for a larger dlr.  I have a full size dslr but it's too heavy.I need to find a happy medium.

ProductInfo.Features:
16 MP Cmos
24x wide-angle zoom
Multi-Recording Function
3.0" 920k Hi-Res LCD Touch Panel
7 fps (16MP) High Speed Sequential Shooting
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus SZ-31MR 16MP CMOS Camera with 24x Wide-Angle Zoom and 3-inch 920k Hi-Res LCD Touch Panel (Silver)
